title: Why silver’s monstrous rally may be a head fake
description: Before chasing the white metal’s rise, investors should take note of its past.

analysis.summary: Examines silver'th potential misleading rally and historical context for prudent caution.

title: Shankar Sharma on the Indian stock market: Why medium-term returns may stay moderate
description: Ace investor Shankar Sharma believes that the Indian stock market may deliver moderate returns in the medium term. With a lack of fresh triggers and macroeconomic concerns, Sharma emphasises the need for cautious expectations despite a promising long-term outlook.

analysis.summary: Shankar Sharma predicts moderate medium-term returns in the Indian stock market due to economic concerns and absence of new catalysts, despite a long-term positive outlook.

title: Sebi proposes overhaul of ‘fit and proper’ test for market intermediaries
description: The markets regulator has proposed doing away with automatic disqualifications over pending criminal complaints and charge sheets, saying these rules risk penalizing individuals and firms before wrongdoing is established.

title: Fiscal realism and RBI patience: The new playbook for Indian bond investors
description: A well-constructed accrual-oriented portfolio that blends high-quality core holdings with measured doses of high-yield credit can potentially deliver superior risk-adjusted returns even in a flat yield environment.

analysis.summary: An investment strategy combining stable assets and selective higher-risk holdings may offer better returns for Indian bondholders.

title: MCX gold rate today reclaims  ₹1,60,000 mark. How much gold should you hold in your portfolio?
description: MCX gold April futures reclaimed the  ₹160,000 mark today, rising as much as 4.5% over its last close, reversing course following a steep correction last week, as a weak US dollar and lower-level buying emerged.

title: Rekha Jhunjhunwala's net worth rises  ₹858 cr from this portfolio stock after India-US trade deal, LIC earns  ₹406 cr
description: Rekha Jhunjhunwala portfolio: Titan Company's shareholding pattern for Q3FY26 reveals that ace Indian investor owns 5.31% stake in this Tata Group's jewellery company

analysis.summary: Rekha Jhunjhunwala's portfolio increase after India-US trade deal boosted Titan stock value, earning LIC significant returns.

title: Sensex rises 79 points, Nifty 50 ends at 25,776— 10 key highlights from the Indian stock market today
description: Sensex rose 79 points, or 0.09%, to end at 83,817.69, while the Nifty 50 ended at 25,776, up 48 points, or 0.19%. The BSE 150 MidCap Index 0.61%, while the BSE 250 SmallCap Index rose 0.54%.

analysis.summary: The Indian stock market saw Sensex rise by 79 points and Nifty end at a higher level. MidCap and SmallCap indices also experienced gains.

title: 1100% rally in five years! Multibagger stock rises 10% following stock market rebound
description: Multibagger stock: Shanti Educational Initiatives' share price opened unchanged at  ₹147.85 apiece on Wednesday, and soon touched the 10% upper price band of  ₹162.60.

analysis.summary: The stock has rallied more than 10% following a market rebound.

title: Top Gainers & Losers on Feb 04: Infosys, TCS, Coforge, HAL, HCL Tech, Wipro, Vardhman Textiles among top losers
description: The Indian stock market continued its bull run on February 4, with Nifty 50 up 0.22% and S&amp;P Sensex up 0.12%. Tech stocks faced heavy losses, particularly the Nifty IT index which dropped 6%, while broader markets outperformed with Nifty Midcap 100 and Smallcap 100 gains.

analysis.summary: Tech sector faces heavy losses amidst market bull run.

title: Yuan vs dollar: Can Chinese yuan dethrone US dollar as world’s reserve currency? Peter Schiff explains
description: On whether China can truly challenge the dollar, Schiff was clear: the process is already underway. Central banks have been steadily increasing gold reserves while reducing exposure to US Treasuries, making gold — not the dollar — the world’s largest reserve asset.

analysis.summary: China'cur reserves strategy shifts away from USD towards gold amidst potential yuan challenge.
